title: A Little Breather
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Maki, you’re here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eli. Do you need anything from me? I told Rin and the others that I wasn’t going to practice today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yeah, I heard about that. You’re writing a new song, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well, yeah.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Rin, Hanayo, and Honoka couldn’t stop talking about it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Don’t worry, it’s going well.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Oh no, I’m not worried at all. I believe in you, Maki.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>But you don’t mind me doing a little bit of something for you, do you? Since you’re always working so hard. Say, why don’t we go to the shrine and get some sweet sake? The cold just makes you want to drink some, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Well, I guess I like sweet sake.... Thanks, Eli.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
